channel.title: Feedback on Joshua Mauldin
channel.description: Recent content in Feedback on Joshua Mauldin

item.title: How To Give Effective Feedback Remotely (Smashing Magazine)
item.description: I wrote about how to give good feedback to other designers and why it’s worth the effort.

item.title: The Prime Directive and the limits of assuming positive intent
item.description: I tackled the notion of assuming positive intent when it comes to conflict. It isn’t as good an idea as you might think.

item.title: How video games taught me to be better at conflict
item.description: An exploration of pattern-based video games and and the correlation to conflict at work.
